entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
